insights_per_request.note: Rough estimate: ~21 major insights across 10 sessions

T2_overload.description: MOMENT OF DISCOMFORT — trigger Reflexive Sprint

discomfort_function.formula: D = w1*core_docs_kb + w2*repo_size_mb + w3*open_todo_count + w4*(1/insights_per_request) + w5*avg_context_tokens_estimate

level_reason: D=91.96 < T1=150: repo is compact, core docs under 200KB, 8 open TODOs manageable

memory_budget.snapshots_retention_policy: Keep named snapshots indefinitely. AUTO-* and POST_COMMIT-* older than 30 days → archive or delete.
memory_budget.archive_policy: When core doc exceeds 10KB, summarize older sections → archive/
